you_must_enable_2fa_to_modify: You must enable 2FA or verify Telegram account to modify this field
you_must_enable_2fa_to_change_password: You must enable 2FA or verify Telegram account to change password
to_secure_your_assets: To secure your assets, we have to verify your identity. Please fill in correct information, it cannot be edited once verified.
would_you_like_to_change_password: Would you like to change your password? Click the button below and change it.
required_for_fund_withdraw: Required for fund withdrawals and security updates.
profile_img_note_1: 1. Please make sure that the photo is complete and clearly visible, in JPG, PNG, JPEG format.
profile_img_note_2: 2. Please take a photo of your ID Card. The photo should be bright and clear, and all corners of your document must be visible.
open_your_google_authenticator_app: Open your Google Authenticator app and scan the QR code below or type the provided key into the app. This key is used to restore your Google Authentication when you change or lose your phone. Please back up the key before activate Google Authentication.
please_take_note_secret_code: Please take note secret code to recovery 2FA
google_is_enabled: Google Authenticator is enabled. To deactivate, enter Google Authenticator code and click Turn Off.
google_is_disabled: Google Authenticator is disabled. To activate, enter Google Authenticator code and click Turn On.
the_new_password_different_current_passw: The new password must be different from the old password
we_will_review_your_document: We will review your documents and complete the process in 7 working days.
